name: tmsds
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2)))

stmt.origin: simp2d(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2)), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2)), wceq(cfv(cmopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c2)))
stmt.pretty: simp2d(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), c0 =(dist ` c2), c1 =(Base ` c2), (MetOpen ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c2))

|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wceq(c0, cfv(cds, c2)))

⊣ (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)→(c1 =(Base ` c2)∧ c0 =(dist ` c2)∧(MetOpen ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c2)))
